pageContext.description:
The subject of this painting is drawn from a text in II Samuel. Starting in the lower left-hand corner of the frame, the Latin translates, 'Joab and Abner; and he strikes him there through the groin. Book of Second Samuel chapter 3:27.'
[Bob Jones University Museum & Gallery, revised 2019]
